H0.text: Who is said to have gained enlightenment sitting under the Bodhi Tree. Siddhartha Gautama

H1.text: Who is said to have gained enlightenment sitting under the Bodhi Tree. Mahavira

H2.text: Who is said to have gained enlightenment sitting under the Bodhi Tree. Adi Shankara

H3.text: Who is said to have gained enlightenment sitting under the Bodhi Tree. Phật

A4.text: the Buddha sat for seven days under the Bodhi tree 'feeling the bliss of deliverance'.

A5.text: the event was said to have occurred under a pipal tree—known as 'the Bodhi tree'—in Bodh Gaya, Bihar.
